channel.title: Files on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Files on TLDRBins

item.title: Find (Windows)
item.description: Windows Show hidden files # Show hidden files in current directory Get-ChildItem -Force # Recusive Get-ChildItem -Path '<PATH>' -Recurse -Force 2>$Null Find a file ls -path '<PATH>' -Filter '<FILE>' -recurse -erroraction silent where /R '<PATH>' '<FILE>' # Find files with wildcard Get-ChildItem -Path '<PATH>' -Recurse -Force -Include '<PATTERN>' 2>$Null *Evil-WinRM* PS C:\programdata> Get-ChildItem -Path 'C:\' -Recurse -Force -Include 'flag.*' 2>$Null Directory: C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop Mode LastWriteTime Length Name ---- ------------- ------ ---- -a---- 10/27/2017 4:02 PM 24 flag.

item.title: Grep
item.description: Basic grep '<STRING>' <FILE> Grep from files recursively (e.g from current directory) grep -rni '<STRING>' . Grep from binary grep -a '<STRING>' <FILE> Grep hash from binary with perl regex grep -aPo '[a-fA-F0-9]{32}' <FILE> Grep from binaries recusively (e.g. from /var/log) sudo grep -rHa "<STRING>" /var/log Find unique char of a file cat <FILE> | od -cvA none -w1 | sort -bu | tr -d '\n' | tr -d ' '

item.title: Windows ACLs
item.description: Window ACLs (Access Control Lists) Check ACLs powershell # Check a file/directory icacls <PATH> PS C:\xampp\htdocs\internal> icacls C:\xampp\htdocs\internal\applications icacls C:\xampp\htdocs\internal\applications C:\xampp\htdocs\internal\applications CREATOR OWNER:(OI)(CI)(IO)(F) OFFICE\PPotts:(OI)(CI)(NP)(F) NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM:(OI)(CI)(F) NT AUTHORITY\LOCAL SERVICE:(OI)(CI)(F) OFFICE\web_account:(OI)(CI)(RX,W) BUILTIN\Administrators:(OI)(CI)(F) BUILTIN\Users:(OI)(CI)(RX) Successfully processed 1 files; Failed processing 0 files # Check all files and directories icacls * /C PS C:\xampp\htdocs\internal> icacls * /C icacls * /C applications CREATOR OWNER:(OI)(CI)(IO)(F) OFFICE\PPotts:(OI)(CI)(NP)(F) NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM:(OI)(CI)(F) NT AUTHORITY\LOCAL SERVICE:(OI)(CI)(F) OFFICE\web_account:(OI)(CI)(RX,W) BUILTIN\Administrators:(OI)(CI)(F) BUILTIN\Users:(OI)(CI)(RX) css NT AUTHORITY\LOCAL SERVICE:(I)(OI)(CI)(F) OFFICE\web_account:(I)(OI)(CI)(RX) NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM:(I)(OI)(CI)(F) BUILTIN\Administrators:(I)(OI)(CI)(F) BUILTIN\Users:(I)(OI)(CI)(RX) CREATOR OWNER:(I)(OI)(CI)(IO)(F) img NT AUTHORITY\LOCAL SERVICE:(I)(OI)(CI)(F) OFFICE\web_account:(I)(OI)(CI)(RX) NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM:(I)(OI)(CI)(F) BUILTIN\Administrators:(I)(OI)(CI)(F) BUILTIN\Users:(I)(OI)(CI)(RX) CREATOR OWNER:(I)(OI)(CI)(IO)(F) index.
